mapper.select: SELECT sd.dictionary_id AS productTypeId, sd.data_value AS productTypeName, IF ( ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_product_type_strategy WHERE product_type_id = sd.dictionary_id AND strategy_id = #{strategyId} ) > 0, 1, 0 ) relationStatus FROM sys_dictionary sd WHERE sd.is_deleted = 0 AND sd.parent_id = 1
